isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - CAB ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - TEMPERATURE/COMPASS DISPLAY

svcproc.title: TEMPERATURE/COMPASS DISPLAY
svcproc.para: The temperature and compass display receives battery power from the (B2) battery adapter through 5A fuse F10-B. Switched ignition power is supplied from the (I1) ignition adapter through 5A fuse F10-A. Ground for the display unit is supplied from the (G3) ground adapter. The unit connects to the temperature sensor on circuits 41C and 41D. Also, the unit connects to the compass module on circuits 41F, 41H and 41J.
